categories: Category:LEGO Star Wars: The Yoda Chronicles Mini Movies

nodes.text: A Farewell To Arm is a two-minute LEGO Mini Movie that is connected to LEGO Star Wars: The Yoda Chronicles animated TV series. It is the eleventh video and was released on YouTube on October 20, 2014.

Jek-14 has been attacked by Darth Vader while on his way to retirement. Following a brief pursuit, Jek uses his droid arm to destroy the pursuing TIE fighters. He then transforms them into a giant baseball bat and whacks Darth Vader's TIE Advanced fighter away.

Jek then travels to meet Yoda on the planet Dagobah. He tells the venerable Jedi Master that he wants to lead a normal life. Yoda obliges to his request and then uses the Force to transform Jek's droid arm into a normal Human one. Jek thanks Yoda and says that he will be able to lead a more peaceful life now before departing on his Jedi Scout Fighter. After Jek leaves, Yoda remarks that his life will be more quiet now. However, the frogs and trees then explode into fireworks.
